mission.posting: Someone has asked us remove all traces of their nudes from the Internet.

email.subject: Revenge Porn
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, It should go without saying that revenge porn is not ok. It's a huge breach of privacy, and people should only share their nudes or sex tapes when they want to. A client has contacted us with this very issue. After a nasty breakup, the client's ex-boyfriend posted images of her nude on Facenook. She's asked us to access his Facenook and delete every single one of those images. Her ex-boyfriend's name is Riley Heathcliffe This is a pretty serious matter.
Good luck, -Quartz
